text: @NYGovCuomo We should start low-risk persons on HCQ and after 2 days, inoculate them with covid-19 via skin prick, and quarantine till no longer contagious. This would produce widespread immunity. It should be voluntary with incentives such as cash and exemption from stay-home orders.
